validationRules.min.password: Password must be at least 8 characters
validationRules.valid.password: Password must contain at least one lowercase character, one uppercase character, one digit, and one special symbol.
validationRules.password.contain.digit: Password must contain at least one digit
validationRules.password.contain.lowerca: Password must contain at least one lowercase character
validationRules.password.contain.upperca: Password must contain at least one uppercase character
validationRules.password.contain.special: Password must contain at least one special character
registration.disclaimer: Your personal data will be used to support your experience throughout this website, to manage access to your account, and for other purposes described in our privacy policy.
activateAccount.resendCode: Not received the code? <resend>Resend</resend> <in>another one in </in>
api.error.invalidRefreshToken: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
api.error.unknown: An unknown error has occurred. Please try again later.
network.disconnected.title: No internet connection
network.disconnected.message: Please check your internet connection and try again.
api.error.resetPasswordOnlyForNormalAcco: Reset password only accepted normal sign up account.
